name: bug_scrub_to_csv

inputs.name: input_filename
inputs.description: Docx File of the GDC PSRR (Bug Scrub)

inputs.name: output_filename
inputs.description: Name of the Output CSV (Should End in .csv)

author: nimbhasi
description:
This script accepts the GDC AS Bug Scrub word document file (.docx) and produces an easy to read CSV file with the following information, for all the bug-IDs present in the bug scrub:

Bug-ID, 
AS Severity, 
Headline, 
CDETS URL, 
CloudApps URL, 
Fixed Releases
